com.ciscowebex.androidsdk.phone

Class MediaOption

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ciscowebex.androidsdk.phone.MediaOption

  • public class MediaOption
extends java.lang.Object
    A data type represents the media options of a call.
    Since:
    0.1

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  MediaOption.CompositedVideoLayout
      The video layout for the active speaker and other attendees in the group video meeting.
      static class  MediaOption.VideoLayout
      Deprecated. 
      please use MediaOption.CompositedVideoLayout

      • hasVideo

        public boolean hasVideo()
        Whether video is enabled.
        Returns:
        False if neither local or remote video is enabled. Otherwise, true.
        Since:
        0.1

      • hasSharing

        Returns:
